item.title: TOTEM Queues
item.description: Totem is a multi-queues management system: it is currently in use in several Banks with different service areas and different counters for each area.

item.title: Techno Check
item.description: Technocheck is an innovative, efficient and effective solution for payment methods and meets current and future end-users’ and financial institutions’ needs.

item.title: Techno-OTP: a signed Once Time Password
item.description: What’s more secure than the current Once Time Password (OTP) solutions to authenticate, for instance, on-line bank transactions?
